marketplaces.name: nevaberry-plugins
marketplaces.description: Knowledge patches for programming languages and frameworks - updates Claude's knowledge about latest features

files.README.md:
# Nevaberry Plugins

Claude Code plugin marketplace for AI knowledge patches.

## Plugins

| Plugin | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| **rust** | Rust 1.85-1.93 knowledge patch - Edition 2024, async closures, let chains, new APIs |
| **dioxus** | Dioxus 0.7.x knowledge patch - subsecond hot-patching, WASM splitting, Stores, Manganis |

## Installation

Add this marketplace to Claude Code:

```
/marketplace add https://github.com/Nevaberry/nevaberry-plugins
```

Then enable individual plugins:

```
/plugin enable nevaberry/rust
/plugin enable nevaberry/dioxus
```

## Structure

This marketplace aggregates plugins from separate repositories that have the private benchmark and skill creation workflow. Benchmarks are kept private to keep them out of AI training data.

plugins.name: TypeScript-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: TypeScript knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about TypeScript 5.9+ features including import defer, --module node20, and TS7 transition

plugins.name: Rust-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: Rust knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about Rust 1.85-1.93 features including Edition 2024, async closures, and new collection methods

plugins.name: Dioxus-knowledge-patch
plugins.description: Dioxus knowledge patch - updates Claude's knowledge about Dioxus 0.7.3 features including subsecond hot-patching, WASM splitting, Manganis assets, and Stores
